Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class SavedGameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.SavedGameManager
public class SavedGameManager extends Object
The SavedGameManager class contains all static methods needed to save and restore games

  • Method Details

    • getSavedGameList

      public static List<SavedGameData> getSavedGameList()
      The method getSavedGameList creates a list with all SavedGameData that represent the games currently saved
      Returns:
      a list with a SavedGameData for every saved game that describes it

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame(GameInterface game)
      The method saveGame saves the given game on a file
      Parameters:
      game - the game to be saved

    • restoreGame

      public static GameInterface restoreGame(String fileName) throws FileNotFoundException
      The method restoreGame restores a game saved on a file
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file where the needed game is saved
      Returns:
      the needed game after it was restored
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if there is no file with the given name

    • saveRunningGame

      public static void saveRunningGame(GameInterface game, int controllerID)
      The method saveRunningGame saves the given running game on a file
      Parameters:
      game - the game to be saved
      controllerID - the univocal ID of the controller bound to the game

    • removeSavedRunningGame

      public static void removeSavedRunningGame(int controllerID)
      The method removeSavedRunningGame deletes, if it exists, the file containing the game bound to the controller with the given controllerID
      Parameters:
      controllerID - the univocal ID of the controller bound to the game
